text:
bore ho rah tha to socha aaj likh hi deta hu....
jab sabse pahle mila tha to ekdum sharif insaan tha( mangal se bhi shareef , y to bezzati ho gyi bc haha) gali vali kuch nhi deta tha. phir dhire dhire launde ka biharipan bahar aane hi lga or ban gya ekdam bakait. Yaad h jab apan CPA m jaate the or apni alag drills or trainings hockey sikhne k liye. enthu to tha pta nhi kyo sikh nhi paaye. 
Mangal ki milkar marne ka alag hi mjaa tha bc or vo jab uski fb ka password hack kiya tha alag hi mja aaya tha. vo CCD vala kand jo mere p hi ulta pad gya tha or mene bc usko dil p le liya (lol kitna chutiya tha me bhi). 
Afsos rhega apan last m mil nhi paye last m ( tere chutiyape ki vajah) par chill mar jald hi milenge or milte rhenge. 
till then all the best for your future life and wish you a lot of success.
author: Rahul Kumar Khichar
